experience.title: experience
experience.description:
I have dedicated my last years of study to creating my own projects to improve my skills and testing different technologies.

Additionally, I have collaborated on some open source projects on Github and created some corporate web pages autonomously. I still don't have experience working for companies as a programmer. But it's only a matter of time :)

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
As a front-end developer, I possess a unique set of skills that enable me to bring website designs to life. My expertise includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js.

I have a keen eye for detail and a strong understanding of responsive design, ensuring that websites look great on any device. I am also proficient in using version control systems such as Git, and have experience working with CSS preprocessors such as Sass. My ability to work in a fast-paced environment, strong problem-solving skills, and commitment to meeting project deadlines make me an ideal candidate for any front-end development project.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
I bring more than just technical skills to the table. I possess excellent soft skills that make me an asset to any team.

I am a strong communicator, able to explain complex technical concepts in a clear and concise manner. I work well under pressure and have the ability to prioritize tasks effectively, ensuring projects are completed on time. My positive attitude and eagerness to learn and take on new challenges make me a team player who is always willing to go the extra mile. I am able to collaborate with designers, back-end developers, and project managers to produce high-quality results. These soft skills, combined with my technical expertise, make me a well-rounded front-end developer.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
Hi @everyone! üëã

My name is √Ålex Rueda and i'm full stack developer. Some years ago i decided to refuse Hogwarts Acceptance Letter to learn another type of magic.

I'm currently working as freelancer building software solutions, like movile apps or awesome web features.

Maybe you have heard about MEVN Stack. The most of my software is built with JavaScript and Vue, using Express and MongoDB as backend, but i also have worked with Wordpress and PHP.

interests.title: interests
interests.description:
I am constantly learning and adapting to new technologies. My creativity and attention to detail make me an asset in designing elegant and user-friendly interfaces.

In my free time, I enjoy building personal projects to challenge myself and improve my skills, and i'm always looking for new opportunities to grow and contribute to meaningful projects.

education.title: education
education.description:
I have always been passionate about learning and self-improvement. Throughout my studies, I have sought out challenging coursework and have consistently pushed myself to expand my knowledge and skills. I have a strong background in a range of subjects, including mathematics, computer science, and design.

I believe that continuous learning is key to success, and I am always looking for new opportunities to improve myself, whether through coursework, online courses, or personal projects. I am a fast learner and I am able to apply what I have learned to real-world problems, making me a valuable asset in any academic or professional setting.

favorite-games.title: favorite-games
favorite-games.description:
Videogames are one of my favorite hobbies, especially strategy-based games such as League of Legends or my childhood-favourite, Final Fantasy saga.

These games offer a unique mix of strategy, teamwork, and individual skill, which I find extremely engaging.I enjoy learning and mastering new champions and strategies in League of Legends, and I find the rich worlds and characters in Final Fantasy to be incredibly immersive.

In my free time, I enjoy playing and competing with friends, and I am always looking for new challenges and ways to improve my gameplay. I believe that video games offer a fantastic way to unwind, connect with others, and develop problem-solving and strategic thinking skills.

GG!

1.title: _discord-gpt
1.description: DiscordGPT is a empowered bot for Discord servers with AI! Experience the ultimate chatbot powered by OpenAI's GPT3.5 for seamless interactions.

2.title: _developer-portfolio-v2
2.description: The first open source version of Portfolio for Developers Concept V.2, designed by @darelova and developed by @me.

3.title: _nuxt-pwa-template
3.description: Modern PWA template built with Nuxt 3.0 and Tailwind, installable in any device and with easy configuration.

4.title: _jukebox-discord
4.description: Advanced music bot for Discord, that allows you to play and controll music in any voice channel using an integrated interface.
